purpose: To autonomously manage social media accounts using AI, with a focus on blockchain integration.
principle: Leverages AI algorithms to schedule posts, engage with followers, and analyze social media metrics, with a specific integration on the Solana blockchain.
reusability: Modular design with API endpoints for social media platforms and blockchain interactions, allowing for easy integration and customization.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited platform support and scalability issues; specific to Solana blockchain.
name: solana-ai-agent
description: This project aims to create an autonomous AI-driven agent that can manage social media accounts
highlight: Integrates AI-driven automation for managing social media accounts on the Solana blockchain.
